modName: Vampire Appearance Fix for Highelves - NOW SUPPORTS FEMALES
summary: Ever used the ability "revert form" as a Vampire in Dawnguard and you play as a Highelf? And you found out after using this ability that your Vampirism is gone and you can`t feed anymore, but you are still weakened in sunlight? Ever noticed this bug? And you went crazy to find a fix for this bug? Then this Bug Fix Mod will help you out!
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone!

This is my first Bug Fix Mod for the Skyrim Dawnguard DLC.
I think everyone know that Dawnguard is Buggy as hell... .

One known Bug is if you just became a Vampire by Lord Harkon and you played as the vanilla highelf race, you use your given Vampire ability to turn into the Vampire Lord form and later on you use your "Revert Form" ability to go to normal.
BUT HERE THIS BUG CAN APPEAR: Now after using "Revert Form" you notice that your eyes are no longer red and nice glowing and you cannot feed anymore or either continue the Quest where you have to talk to Garan Marethi (He just says, that you are mortal and have to return to Harkon so he can "correct" this mortal Problem...)

Well this mod attemps to fix that!

BUT BE SURE THAT YOU WAS TURNED TO A VAMPIRE BY LORD HARKON OR SERANA!!! OTHERWISE YOU HAVE GOT A PROBLEM!!!

AS A NOTE:
---------------
WHILE USING THIS MOD YOU CANNOT GET RID OF YOUR VAMPIRISM SO EASILY!!!
MAYBE YOU CAN USE "SHOWRACEMENU" TO CHANGE YOUR RACE, BUT IF YOU WANT TO STILL PLAY AS A HIGHELF WITHOUT HAVING VAMPIRISM, YOU CANNOT DO THIS WITH THIS MOD INSTALLED.
BECAUSE THIS MOD DO ALTERS THE VAMPIRE FEATURE FOR HIGHELVES COMPLETELY.
ALSO THIS MOD IS IN EARLY BETA, SO OTHER BUGS OR CONFLICTS WITH OTHER MODS CAN APPEAR!
ESPICALLY WITH MODS THAT ALTERS THE HIGHELF RACE!!!

TESTED WITH BETTER VAMPIRES MOD BY BREHANIN WORKS PERFECT!!!
I do HIGHLY RECOMMEND to use this mod with Better Vampires mod!!!

DVA COMPATIBILITY:
-------------------------
IS NOT TESTED YET SO PLEASE DON`T TRY IT TO USE WITH THIS MOD! (WHEN A GAME IS BROKE THE GAME IS BROKE!!!)

Sorry for my bad English... I`m German!!!
author: happybuddergie
